EmailTemplate.subject: Hear What Clients Are Saying About Livongo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Did you know that 90% of US healthcare spend is attributable to people with chronic and behavioral health conditions? Livongo provides a whole person platform that empowers people with chronic conditions to live better and healthier lives, beginning with diabetes and now including hypertension, weight management, diabetes prevention, and behavioral health.
Watch this 2 minute video that features benefits leaders from Delta Airlines, Jefferson Health, and SAP, who talk to how they improved the health for their population and also experienced a return on their investment.
I'd love to discuss how our program can help {!Account.Name}. Do you have time next week for a 15-minute phone call?
Thanks, {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Email}
